scripts.app: concurrently "(npm run start:dev --prefix screenBotback)" "(npm run dev --prefix screenBot)" "(npm run start --prefix screenBotFront)"
scripts.upnpm: npm i && cd screenBot && npm i && cd .. && cd screenBotback && npm i && cd .. && cd screenBotFront && npm i && cd ..
scripts.gitup: git add . && git commit -m 'home' && git push origin main
